text.one: Send me a message and I’ll help you get your business online ›
text.two: You can share your idea or just ask a question ›

testimonial.name: Javier
testimonial.testimonial: “He helped me get a clean, well-made website up in just a few days. I always felt like he was just a message away if I had questions.”

two.text: I’ll reach out via WhatsApp or email ›

three.shiny: I don’t share it with anyone
